scripts.predev: BUNDLE_PATH=vendor/bundle BUNDLE_APP_CONFIG=.bundle bundle check || BUNDLE_PATH=vendor/bundle BUNDLE_APP_CONFIG=.bundle bundle install --path vendor/bundle
scripts.dev: BUNDLE_PATH=vendor/bundle BUNDLE_APP_CONFIG=.bundle bundle exec jekyll serve --livereload
scripts.prebuild: BUNDLE_PATH=vendor/bundle BUNDLE_APP_CONFIG=.bundle bundle check || BUNDLE_PATH=vendor/bundle BUNDLE_APP_CONFIG=.bundle bundle install --path vendor/bundle
scripts.build: BUNDLE_PATH=vendor/bundle BUNDLE_APP_CONFIG=.bundle bundle exec jekyll build
scripts.preclean: BUNDLE_PATH=vendor/bundle BUNDLE_APP_CONFIG=.bundle bundle check || BUNDLE_PATH=vendor/bundle BUNDLE_APP_CONFIG=.bundle bundle install --path vendor/bundle
scripts.clean: BUNDLE_PATH=vendor/bundle BUNDLE_APP_CONFIG=.bundle bundle exec jekyll clean
